GK16andhvy_u:1673: chāyātiśaya-yogam icchati tena teṣāṃ rasānām anyatamaḥ kaścid vivakṣito raso 'ṅgitvena viniveśayitavya ity ayaṃ yuktataro mārgaḥ || DhvA_3.21 ||
GK16andhvy_u:1674: nanu rasāntareṣu bahuṣu prāpta-paripoṣeṣu satsu katham ekasyāṅgitā na virudhyata ity āśaṅkyedam
GK16andhvy_u:1677: prabandheṣu prathamataraṃ prastutaḥ san punaḥ punar anusandhīyamānatvena sthāyī yo rasas tasya sakala-bandha-vyāpino rasāntarair antarāla-vartibhiḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1678: samāveśo yaḥ sa nāṅgitām upahanti || DhvA_3.22 ||
GK16andhvy_u:1680: kāryam ekaṃ yathā vyāpi prabandhasya vidhīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1681: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // DhvK_3.23 //
GK16andhvy_u:1682: sandhyādi-mayasya prabandha-śarīrasya yathā kāryam ekam anuyāyi vyāpakaṃ kalpyate na ca tat-kāryāntarair na saṅkīryate, na ca taiḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1683: saṅkīryamāṇasyāpi tasya prādhānyam apacīyate, tathaiva rasasyāpy ekasya
GK16andhvy_u:1686: anusandhānavatāṃ sa-cetasāṃ tathā-vidhe viṣaye prahlādātiśayaḥ pravartate
GK16andhvy_u:1687: nanu yeṣāṃ rasānāṃ parasparāvirodhaḥ yathā-vīra-śṛṅgārayoḥ śṛṅgāra-hāsyayo
GK16andhvy_u:1690: teṣāṃ tu sa kathaṃ bhaved yeṣāṃ parasparaṃ bādhya-bādhaka-bhāvaḥ ? yathā-śṛṅgāra-bībhatsayor
GK16andhvy_u:1691: vīra-bhayānakayoḥ śānta-raudrayoḥ śanta-śṛṅgārayor vā ity āśaṅkyedam
GK16andhvy_u:1694: paripoṣaṃ na netavyas tathā syād avirodhitā // DhvK_3.24 //
GK16andhvy_u:1695: aṅgini rasāntare śṛṅgārādau prabandha-vyaṅgye sati avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ paripoṣaṃ na netavyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1697: antam ādhikyaṃ na kartavyam ity ayaṃ prathamaḥ paripoṣa-parihāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1701: snehena raṇa-rasena ca bhaṭasya dolāyitaṃ hṛdayam /
GK16andhvy_u:1703: kaṇṭhāc chitvākṣamālāvalayam iva kare hāram āvartayantī kṛtvā paryaṅka-bandhaṃ viṣadhara-patinā mekhalāyā guṇena /
GK16andhvy_u:1705: devī sandhyābhyasūyā hasita-paśupatis tatra dṛṣṭā tu vo 'vyāt //ity atra /
GK16andhvy_u:1706: aṅgirasa-viruddhānāṃ vyabhicāriṇāṃ prācuryeṇāniveśanam, niveśane vā kṣipram evāṅgirasa-vyabhicāry-anuvṛttir iti dvitīyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1707: aṅgatvena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣā paripoṣaṃ nīyamānasyāpy aṅga-bhūtasya rasasyeti tṛtīyaḥ anayā diśānye 'pi prakārā utprekṣaṇīyāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1708: virodhinas tu rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayā kasyacin nyūnatā sampādanīyā /
GK16andhvy_u:1711: paripoṣa-rahitasya rasasya kathaṃ rasatvam iti cet-uktam atrāṅgirasāpekṣayeti /
GK16andhvy_u:1712: aṅgino hi rasasya yāvān paripoṣas tāvāṃs tasya na kartavyaḥ, svatas tu sambhavī paripoṣaḥ kena vāryate /
GK16andhvy_u:1713: etac cāpekṣikaṃ prakarṣa-yogitvam ekasya rasasya bahu-raseṣu
GK16andhvy_u:1715: ity anena prakāreṇāvirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca rasānām aṅgāṅgi-bhāvena
GK16andhvy_u:1717: etac ca sarvaṃ yeṣāṃ raso rasāntarasya vyabhicārī bhavati iti darśanaṃ tan-matenocyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1719: 'pi rasānāṃ sthāyino bhāvā upacārād rasa-śabdenoktās teṣām aṅgatvaṃ nirvirodham eva || evam avirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca prabandha-sthenāṅginā rasena samāveśe sādhāraṇam avirodhopāyaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ virodhi-viṣayam eva taṃ pratipādayitum idam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1720: viruddhaikāśrayo yas tu virodhī sthāyino bhavet /
GK16andhvy_u:1721: sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryas tasya poṣe 'py adoṣatā // DhvK_3.25 //
GK16andhvy_u:1722: ekādhikaraṇy avirodhī nairantarya-virodhī ceti dvividho virodhī /
GK16andhvy_u:1724: prabandha-sthena sthāyināṅginā rasenaucityāpekṣayā viruddhaikāśrayo yo virodhī yathā vīreṇa bhayānakaḥ sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1725: tasya vīrasya ya āśrayaḥ kathānāyakas tad-vipakṣa-viṣaye sanniveśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1726: tathā sati ca tasya virodhino 'pi yaḥ paripoṣaḥ sa nirdoṣaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1728: bhayātiśaya-varṇane nāyakasya naya-parākramādi-sampat sutarām uddyotitā bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:1732: rasenāṅga-bhāva-gamane nirvirodhatvaṃ yathā tathā tad darśitam /
GK16andhvy_u:1736: yaḥ punar ekādhikaraṇatve nirvirodho nairantarye tu virodhī sa rasāntara-vyavadhānena prabandhe niveśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1739: śāntaś ca tṛṣṇā-kṣaya-sukhasya yaḥ paripoṣas tal-lakṣaṇo rasaḥ pratīyata eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1741: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham /
GK16andhvy_u:1743: yadi nāma sarva-janānubhava-gocaratā tasya nāsti naitāvatāsāv
GK16andhvy_u:1745: na ca vīre tasyāntar-bhāvaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1754: śānta-rasa-prabhedatvam, itarathā tu vīra-prabhedatvam iti vyavasthāpyamāne na kaścid virodhaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1761: nivartate hi rasayoḥ samāveśe virodhitā // DhvK_3.27 //
GK16andhvy_u:1762: rasāntara-vyavahitayor eka-prabandha-sthayor virodhitā nivartata ity atra na kācid bhrāntiḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1763: yasmād eka-vākya-sthayor api rasayor uktayā nītyā viruddhatā nivartate /
GK16andhvy_u:1769: sa-śoṇitaiḥ kravya-bhujāṃ sphuradbhiḥ pakṣaiḥ khagānām u pavījyamānān /
GK16andhvy_u:1773: nirdiśyamānāṃ lalanāṅgulībhir vīrāḥ sva-dehān patitān apaśyan //ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:1774: atra hi śṛṅgāra-bībhatsayos tad-aṅgayor vā vīra-rasa-vyavadhānena samāveśo na virodhī /
GK16andhvy_u:1776: viśeṣatas tu śṛṅgāre sukumāratamā hy asau // DhvK_3.28 //
GK16andhvy_u:1778: ca nirūpayet sahṛdayaḥ; viśeṣatas tu śṛṅgāre /
GK16andhvy_u:1779: sa hi rati-paripoṣātmakatvād rateś ca svalpenāpi nimittena bhaṅga-sambhavāt
GK16andhvy_u:1780: sukumāratamaḥ sarvebhyo rasebhyo manāg api virodhi-samāveśaṃ na sahate /
GK16andhvy_u:1782: bhavet tasmin pramādo hi jhaṭity evopalakṣyate // DhvK_3.29 //
GK16andhvy_u:1783: tatraiva ca rase sarvebhyo 'pi rasebhyaḥ saukumāryātiśaya-yogini kavir avadhānavān prayatnavān syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:1786: śṛṅgāra-raso hi saṃsāriṇāṃ niyamenānubhava-viṣayatvāt sarva-rasebhyaḥ kamanīyatayā pradhāna-bhūtaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1790: śṛṅgāra-viruddha-rasa-sparśaḥ śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ yaḥ sa na kevalam avirodha-lakṣaṇa-yoge sati na duṣyati yāvad vineyān unmukhīkartuṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1791: kāvya-śobhārtham eva vā kriyamāṇo na duṣyati /
GK16andhvy_u:1792: śṛṅgāra-rasāṅgair unmukhī-kṛtāḥ santo hi vineyāḥ sukhaṃ vinayopadeśān gṛhṇanti /
GK16andhvy_u:1793: sad-ācāropadeśa-rūpā hi nāṭakādi-goṣṭhī vineya-jana-hitārtham eva munibhir avatāritā /
GK16andhvy_u:1795: kāvye śobhātiśayaṃ puṣyatīty anenāpi prakāreṇa virodhini rase
GK16andhvy_u:1798: satyaṃ manoramā rāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1802: viṣayaṃ sukaviḥ kāvyaṃ kurvan muhyati na kvacit // DhvK_3.31 //
GK16andhvy_u:1804: parasparaṃ virodhasyāvirodhasya ca viṣayaṃ vijñāya sukaviḥ kāvya-viṣaye
GK16andhvy_u:1805: pratibhātiśaya-yuktaḥ kāvyaṃ kurvan na kvacin muhyati /
GK16andhvy_u:1808: vācyānāṃ vācakānāṃ ca yad aucityena yojanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1811: rasādi-viṣayeṇaucityena yad yojanam etan mahākaver mukhyaṃ karma /
GK16andhvy_u:1812: ayam eva hi mahākaver mukhyo vyāpāro yad rasādīnām eva mukhyatayā kāvyārthīkṛtya tad-vyakty-anuguṇatvena śabdānām arthānāṃ copanibandhanam
GK16andhvy_u:1813: etac ca rasāditātparyeṇa kāvyanibandhanaṃ bharatādāvapi suprasiddham eveti pratipādayitum
GK16andhvy_u:1815: aucityavānyastā etā vṛttayo dvividhāḥ sthitāḥ // DhvK_3.33 //
GK16andhvy_u:1817: tatra rasānuguṇa aucityavān vācyāśrayo yo vyavahāras tā etāḥ kaiśiky-ādyā vṛttayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1819: vṛttayo hi rasādi-tātparyeṇa saṃniveśitāḥ kām api nāṭyasya kāvyasya ca
GK16andhvy_u:1821: rasādayo hi dvayor api tayor jīva-bhūtāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1823: atra kecid āhuḥ-”guṇa-guṇi-vyavahāro rasādīnām itivṛttādibhiḥ saha yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:1825: rasādi-mayaṃ hi vācyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu rasādibhiḥ pṛthag-bhūtam” iti /
GK16andhvy_u:1826: atrocyate-yadi rasādi-mayam eva vācyaṃ yathā gauratva-mayaṃ śarīram /
GK16andhvy_u:1827: evaṃ sati yathā śarīre pratibhāsamāne niyamenaiva gauratvaṃ pratibhāsate sarvasya tathā vācyena sahaiva rasādayo 'pi sahṛdayasyāsahṛdayasya ca pratibhāseran /
GK16andhvy_u:1828: na caivam; tathā caitat pratipāditam eva prathamoddyote /
GK16andhvy_u:1830: ratnānām iva jātyatvaṃ pratipattṛ-viśeṣataḥ saṃvedyaṃ vācyānāṃ rasādi-rūpatvam iti /
GK16andhvy_u:1832: yato yathā jātyatvena pratibhāsamāne ratne ratna-svarūpānatiriktatvam eva tasya lakṣyate tathā rasādīnām api vibhāvānubhāvādi-rūpa-vācyāvyatiriktatvam eva lakṣyeta /
GK16andhvy_u:1834: caivam; na hi vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāriṇa eva rasā iti kasyacid avagamaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1835: ata eva ca vibhāvādi-pratīty-avinābhāvinī rasādīnāṃ pratītir iti
GK16andhvy_u:1837: sa tu lāghavān na prakāśyate “ity alakṣya-kramā eva santo vyaṅgyā rasādayaḥ” ity uktam /
GK16andhvy_u:1838: nanu śabda eva prakaraṇādy-avacchinno vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ samam eva pratītim
GK16andhvy_u:1845: atrāpi brūmaḥ-prakaraṇādy-avacchedena vyañjakatvaṃ śabdānām ity anumatam evaitad asmākam /
GK16andhvy_u:1846: kiṃ tu tad-vyañjakatvaṃ teṣāṃ kadācit svarūpa-viśeṣa-nibandhanaṃ kadācid vācaka-śakti-nibandhanam
GK16andhvy_u:1847: tatra yeṣāṃ vācaka-śakti-nibandhanaṃ teṣāṃ yadi vācya-pratītim antareṇaiva
GK16andhvy_u:1848: svarūpa-pratītyā niṣpannaṃ tad bhaven na tarhi vācaka-śakti-nibandhanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1851: sa tu kramo yadi lāghavān na lakṣyate tat kiṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1853: rasādi-pratītiḥ syāt tad-anavadhārita-prakaraṇānāṃ vācya-vācakabhāve ca svayam avyutpannānāṃ pratipattṝṇāṃ kāvya-mātra-śravaṇād evāsau bhavet /
GK16andhvy_u:1854: saha-bhāve ca vācya-pratīter anupayogaḥ, upayoge vā na sahabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1855: yeṣām api svarūpa-viśeṣa-pratīti-nimittaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā gītādi-śabdānāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1856: teṣām api svarūpa-pratīter vyaṅgya-pratīteś ca niyama-bhāvī kramaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1858: āśu-bhāvinīṣu vācyenāvirodhiny abhidheyāntara-vilakṣaṇe rasādau na pratīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1861: tatrāpi katham iti ced ucyate-artha-śakti-mūlānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgye dhvanau tāvad abhidheyasya
GK16andhvy_u:1863: aśakya-nihnavo nimitta-nimitti-bhāva iti sphuṭam eva tatra paurvāparyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1865: tathā-vidhe ca viṣaye vācya-vyaṅgyayor atyanta-vilakṣaṇatvād yaiva ekasya pratītiḥ saivetarasyeti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvy_u:1866: śabda-śakti-mūlānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgye tu dhvanau-”gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ parama-parimitāṃ prītim utpādayantu” ity ādāv artha-dvaya-pratītau śābdyām
GK16andhvy_u:1868: artha-sāmarthyād ākṣipteti, tatrāpi sulakṣam abhidheya-vyaṅgyālaṅkāra-pratītyoḥ paurvāparyam
GK16andhvy_u:1871: yojanam aśābdam apy arthād avasthitam ity atrāpi pūrvavad abhidheya-tat-sāmarthyākṣiptālaṅkāra-mātra-pratītyoḥ susthitam eva paurvāparyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1872: ārthy api ca pratipattis tathāvidhe viṣaye
GK16andhvy_u:1882: sa tūkta-yuktyā kvacil lakṣyate kvacin na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1883: tad evaṃ vyañjaka-mukhena dhvani-prakāreṣu nirūpiteṣu kaścid brūyāt-kim
GK16andhvy_u:1884: idaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nāma vyaṅgyārtha-prakāśanam, na hi vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:1886: vyaṅgyāpekṣayā ca vyañjakatva-siddhir ity anyonya-saṃśrayād avyavasthānam /
GK16andhvy_u:1888: vācya-vyatiriktasya vyaṅgyasya siddhiḥ prāg eva pratipāditā tat-siddhy-adhīnā ca vyañjaka-siddhir iti kaḥ paryanuyogāvasaraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1890: prāg-ukta-yuktibhir vācya-vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ siddhiḥ kṛtā, sa tv artho vyaṅgyatayaiva kasmād vyapadiśyate yatra ca prādhānyenānavasthānaṃ tatra vācyatayaivāsau vyapadeṣṭuṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:1892: ataś ca tat-prakāśino vākyasya vācakatvam eva
GK16andhvy_u:1894: kiṃ tasya vyāpārāntara-kalpanayā ? tasmāt tātparya-viṣayo yo
GK16andhvy_u:1899: atrocyate-yatra śabdaḥ svārtham abhidadhāno 'rthāntaram avagamayati tatra yat tasya svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ yac ca tadarthāntarāvagama-hetutvaṃ tayor aviśeṣo viśeṣo vā /
GK16andhvy_u:1900: na tāvad aviśeṣaḥ; yasmāt tau dvau vyāpārau
GK16andhvy_u:1903: vyāpāraḥ śabdasya svārtha-viṣayaḥ gamakatva-lakṣaṇas tv arthāntara-viṣayaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1904: / na ca sva-para-vyavahāro vācya-vyaṅgyayor apahnotuṃ śakyaḥ, ekasya sambandhitvena pratīter aparasya sambandhi-sambandhitvena /
GK16andhvy_u:1905: vācyo hy arthaḥ sākṣāc-chabdasya sambandhī tad-itaras tv abhidheya-sāmarthyākṣiptaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1907: yadi ca sva-sambandhitvaṃ sākṣāt tasya syāt
GK16andhvy_u:1909: tasmād viṣaya-bhedas tāvat tayor vyāpārayoḥ suprasiddhaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1916: ity ādiśloke ceṣṭāviśeṣaḥ sukavinārtha-prakāśanahetuḥ pradarśita eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1917: tasmād bhinna-viṣayatvādbhinna-rūpatvāc ca svārthābhidhāyitvam arthāntarāvagama-hetutvaṃ ca śabdasya yat tayoḥ spaṣṭa eva bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1920: śabda-vyāpāra-gocaratvaṃ tu tasyāsmābhir iṣyata eva, tat tu vyaṅgyatvenaiva na vācyatvena
GK16andhvy_u:1922: śabdāntareṇa svārthābhidhāyinā yad-viṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktir eva
GK16andhvy_u:1927: yair apy asatyatvam asyā nābhyupeyate tair vākyārtha-padārthayor ghaṭa-tad-upādāna-kāraṇa-nyāyo
GK16andhvy_u:1929: yathā hi ghaṭe niṣpanne tad-upādāna-kāraṇānāṃ na
GK16andhvy_u:1930: pṛthag-upalambhas tathaiva vākye tad-arthe vā pratīte pada-tad-arthānāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1931: teṣāṃ tadā vibhaktatayopalambhe vākyārtha-buddhir eva dūrībhavet /
GK16andhvy_u:1932: na tv eṣa vācya-vyaṅgyayor nyāyaḥ, na hi vyaṅgye pratīyamāne vācya-buddhir
GK16andhvy_u:1935: ghaṭa-pradīpa-nyāyas tayoḥ, yathaiva hi pradīpa-dvāreṇa ghaṭa-pratītāv
GK16andhvy_u:1936: utpannāyāṃ na pradīpa-prakāśo nivartate tad-vyaṅgya-pratītau vācyāvabhāsaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1937: / yat tu prathamoddyote “yathā padārtha-dvāreṇa” (1.10) ity ādy-uktaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1939: nanv evaṃ yugapad-artha-dvaya-yogitvaṃ vākyasya prāptaṃ tad-bhāve ca tasya vākyataiva vighaṭate, tasyā aikārthya-lakṣaṇatvāt ; naiṣa doṣaḥ ;
GK16andhvy_u:1942: vācyasyopasarjana-bhāvaḥ kvacid vācyasya prādhānyam aparasya guṇa-bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1943: tatra vyaṅgya-prādhānye dhvanir ity uktam eva ; vācya-prādhānye tu prakārāntaraṃ nirdekṣyate
GK16andhvy_u:1945: kāvyasya na vyaṅgyasyābhidheyatvam api tu vyaṅgyatvam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1946: kiṃ ca vyaṅgyasya prādhānyenāvivakṣāyāṃ vācyatvaṃ tāvad bhavadbhir nābhyupagantavyam atatparatvāc chabdasya /
GK16andhvy_u:1947: tad asti tāvad vyaṅgyaḥ śabdānāṃ kaścid viṣaya iti /
GK16andhvy_u:1948: yatrāpi tasya prādhānyaṃ tatrāpi kim iti tasya svarūpam apahnūyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1949: evaṃ tāvad vācakatvād anyad eva vyañjakatvam ;
GK16andhvy_u:1950: itaś ca vācakatvād vyañjakatvasyānyatvaṃ yad vācakatvaṃ śabdaikāśrayam itarat tu śabdāśrayam arthāśrayaṃ ca śabdārthayor dvayor api vyañjakatvasya pratipāditatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:1957: na hy arthād vyaṅgya-traya-pratītir yā tasyā amukhyatvaṃ manāg api lakṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1958: ayaṃ cānyaḥ svarūpa-bhedaḥ-yad guṇa-vṛttir amukhyatvena vyavasthitaṃ vācakatvam evocyate
GK16andhvy_u:1959: vyañjakatvaṃ tu vācakatvād atyantaṃ vibhinnam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1964: vyañjakatva-mārge tu yadārtho 'rthāntaraṃ dyotayati tadā svarūpaṃ prakāśayann evāsāv anyasya
GK16andhvy_u:1969: lakṣayati tatra lakṣaṇā-vyavahāraḥ kriyate, tad evaṃ sati lakṣaṇaiva mukhyaḥ śabda-vyāpāra iti prāptam /
GK16andhvy_u:1972: nanu tvat-pakṣe 'pi yadārtho vyaṅgya-trayaṃ prakāśayati tadā śabdasya
GK16andhvy_u:1974: tathā-vidhaṃ vyañjakatvam iti śabdasya tatropayogaḥ katham apahnūyate ?
GK16andhvy_u:1976: yato vyañjakatvasya rasādayo 'laṅkāra-viśeṣā vyaṅgya-rūpāvacchinnaṃ vastu ceti trayaṃ viṣayaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1977: tatra rasādi-pratītir guṇa-vṛttir iti na kenacid ucyate na ca śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvy_u:1979: vastu-cārutva-pratītaye sva-śabdānabhidheyatvena yat pratipipādayitum iṣyate tad vyaṅgyam
GK16andhvy_u:1983: yadapi ca guṇa-vṛtter viṣayastad api ca vyañjakatvānupraveśena /
GK16andhvy_u:1987: vyañjakatvaṃ hi kvacid vācakatvāśrayeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate, yathā
GK16andhvy_u:1991: tad-ubhayāśrayatva-pratipādanāyaiva ca dhvaneḥ prathamataraṃ dvau prabhedāv upanyastau
GK16andhvy_u:1994: yasmān na tad-vācakatvaika-rūpam eva, kvacil lakṣaṇāśrayeṇa vṛtteḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1995: na ca lakṣaṇaika-rūpam evānyatra vācakatvāśrayeṇa vyavasthānāt /
GK16andhvy_u:2000: tathā hi gīta-dhvanīnām api vyañjakatvam asti rasādi-viṣayam /
GK16andhvy_u:2001: na ca teṣāṃ vācakatvaṃ lakṣaṇā vā kathañcil lakṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2002: śabdād anyatrāpi viṣaye vyañjakatvasya darśanād vācakatvādi-śabda-dharma-prakāratvam ayuktaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvy_u:2005: tac chabdasyaiva prakāratvena kasmān na parikalpyate ?
GK16andhvy_u:2006: tad evaṃ śābde vyavahāre trayaḥ prakārāḥ-vācakatvaṃ guṇa-vṛttir
GK16andhvy_u:2008: tatra vyañjakatve yadā vyaṅgya-prādhānyaṃ tadā dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:2009: tasya cāvivakṣita-vācyo vivakṣitānya-para-vācyaś ceti dvau prabhedāv
GK16andhvy_u:2011: anyo brūyāt-nanu vivakṣitānya-para-vācye dhvanau guṇa-vṛttitā nāstīti yad ucyate tad yuktam
GK16andhvy_u:2013: yatrārthāntara-pratipattis tatra kathaṃ guṇa-vṛtti-vyavahāraḥ, na hi guṇa-vṛttau yadā nimittena kenacid viṣayāntare śabda āropyate
GK16andhvy_u:2015: yathā-”agnir māṇavakaḥ” ity ādau, yadā vā svārtham aṃśenāparityajaṃs tat-sambandha-dvāreṇa viṣayāntaram ākrāmati,
GK16andhvy_u:2018: ata eva ca vivakṣitānya-para-vācye dhvanau vācya-vācakayor dvayor api svarūpa-pratītir arthāvagamanaṃ ca dṛśyata iti vyañjakatva-vyavahāro
GK16andhvy_u:2020: svarūpaṃ prakāśayann eva parāvabhāsako vyañjaka ity
GK16andhvy_u:2021: ucyate, tathāvidhe viṣaye vācakatvasyaiva vyañjakatvam iti guṇa-vṛtti-vyavahāro niyamenaiva na śakyate kartum /
GK16andhvy_u:2022: avivakṣita-vācyas tu dhvanir guṇa-vṛtteḥ kathaṃ bhidyate ? tasya prabheda-dvaye
GK16andhvy_u:2029: vyañjakatvaṃ ca yathokta-cārutva-hetuṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vinā na
GK16andhvy_u:2033: āhlādakatvāc candra evāsyā mukham ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:2034: yathā ca “priye jane nāsti punar uktam” ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:2036: upalakṣaṇīyārtha-saṃbandha-mātrāśrayeṇa cāru-rūpa-vyaṅgya-pratītiṃ vināpi sambhavaty eva, yathā-”mañcāḥ krośanti” ity ādau viṣaye /
GK16andhvy_u:2037: yatra tu sā cāru-rūpa-vyaṅgya-pratīti-hetus tatrāpi vyañjakatvānupraveśenaiva vācakatvavat
GK16andhvy_u:2039: vyavahāraḥ, yathā-”suvarṇa-puṣpāṃ pṛthivīm” ity ādau tatra
GK16andhvy_u:2041: guṇa-vṛttau satyām api dhvani-vyavahāra eva yukty-anurodhī /
GK16andhvy_u:2043: avivakṣita-vācye dhvanau dvayor api prabhedayor vyañjakatva-viśeṣāviśiṣṭā
GK16andhvy_u:2044: guṇa-vṛttir na tu tad-eka-rūpā sahṛdaya-hṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā
GK16andhvy_u:2046: etac ca sarvaṃ prāk sūcitam api sphuṭatara-pratītaye punar uktam /
GK16andhvy_u:2047: api ca vyañjakatva-lakṣaṇo yaḥ śabdārthayor dharmaḥ sa
GK16andhvy_u:2049: śabdārthayor hi prasiddho yaḥ sambandho vācya-vācaka-bhāvākhyas tam anurundhāna eva vyañjakatva-lakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ sāmagry-antara-sambandhād
GK16andhvy_u:2052: vācakatvaṃ hi śabda-viśeṣasya niyata ātmā vyutpatti-kālād ārabhya tad-avinābhāvena tasya prasiddhatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:2056: nanu yady aniyatas tat kiṃ tasya svarūpa-parīkṣayā ? naiṣa doṣaḥ ; yataḥ śabdātmani tasyāniyatatvam, na tu sve viṣaye vyaṅgya-lakṣaṇe /
GK16andhvy_u:2057: liṅgatva-nyāyaś cāsya vyañjaka-bhāvasya lakṣyate, yathā liṅgatvam āśrayeṣv
GK16andhvy_u:2060: śabdātmany aniyatatvād eva ca tasya vācakatva-prakāratā na śakyā kalpayitum /
GK16andhvy_u:2061: yadi hi vācakatva-prakāratā tasya bhavet tac-chabdātmani niyatatāpi syād vācakatvavat
GK16andhvy_u:2062: sa ca tathā-vidha aupādhiko dharmaḥ śabdānām
GK16andhvy_u:2065: tad anabhyupagame hi tasya śabdārtha-sambandha-nityatve saty apy apauruṣeya-pauruṣeyayor vākyayor artha-pratipādane nirviśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:2075: tasmāt pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ saty api naisargike 'rtha-sambandhe mithyārthatvaṃ samarthayitum
GK16andhvy_u:2076: vācakatva-vyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid rūpam aupādhikaṃ vyaktam evābhidhānīyam /
GK16andhvy_u:2079: pauruṣeyāṇi ca vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyam eva prakāśayanti /
GK16andhvy_u:2080: sa ca vyaṅgya eva na tv abhidheyaḥ, tena sahābhidhānasya vācya-vācakabhāva-lakṣaṇa-sambandhābhāvāt
GK16andhvy_u:2081: nanv anena nyāyena sarveṣām eva laukikānāṃ vākyānāṃ dhvani-vyavahāraḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2084: satyam etat; kiṃ tu vaktr-abhiprāya-prakāśanena yad vyañjakatvaṃ tat sarveṣām eva laukikānāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2086: tat tu vācakatvān na bhidyate vyaṅgyam hi tatra nāntarīyakatayā vyavasthitam /
GK16andhvy_u:2088: yasya tu vivakṣitatvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ tad vyañjakatvaṃ dhvani-vyavahārasya
GK16andhvy_u:2090: yat tv abhiprāya-viśeṣa-rūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tad bhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvy_u:2091: kintu tad eva kevalam aparimita-viṣayasya dhvani-vyavahārasya na prayojakam avyāpakatvāt
GK16andhvy_u:2092: tathā darśita-bheda-traya-rūpaṃ tātparyeṇa dyotyamānam abhiprāya-rūpam anabhiprāya-rūpaṃ ca sarvam eva dhvani-vyavahārasya
GK16andhvy_u:2093: prayojakam iti yathokta-vyañjaktva-viśeṣe dhvani-lakṣaṇe nātivyāptir na cāvyāptiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2095: śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2097: pravṛtto 'yaṃ dhvani-vyavahāra iti taiḥ saha kiṃ virodhāvirodhau cintyete
GK16andhvy_u:2099: evāyaṃ vyañjaka-bhāvaḥ śabdānām arthāntarāṇām ivāvirodhaś ceti na pratikṣepya-padavīm avatarati
GK16andhvy_u:2100: vācakatve hi tārkikāṇāṃ vipratipattayaḥ pravartantām, kim idaṃ svābhāvikaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2101: śabdānām āho svit sāmayikam ity ādyāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2103: bhāvāntara-sādhāraṇe loka-prasiddha evānugamyamāne ko vimatīnām avasaraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2104: alaukike hy arthe tārkikāṇāṃ vimatayo nikhilāḥ pravartante na tu laukike /
GK16andhvy_u:2105: na hi nīla-madhurādiṣv aśeṣa-lokendriya-gocare bādhā-rahite tattve parasparaṃ vipratipannā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvy_u:2106: na hi bādhā-rahitaṃ nīlaṃ nīlam iti
GK16andhvy_u:2107: bruvann apareṇa pratiṣidhyate naitan nīlaṃ pītam etad iti /
GK16andhvy_u:2108: tathaiva vyañjakatvaṃ vācakānāṃ śabdānām avācakānāṃ ca gīta-dhvanīnām
GK16andhvy_u:2109: aśabda-rūpāṇāṃ ca ceṣṭādīnāṃ yat sarveṣām anubhava-siddham eva tat kenāpahnūyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2110: aśabdam arthaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ hi sūcayanto vyāhārās tathā vyāpārā nibaddhāś cānibaddhāś ca vidagdha-pariṣatsu vividhā vibhāvyante /
GK16andhvy_u:2111: tān upahāsyatām ātmanaḥ pariharan ko 'tisandadhīta sacetāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2112: atha brūyāt, asty atisandhānāvasaraḥ vyañjakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ gamakatvaṃ tac
GK16andhvy_u:2113: ca liṅgatvam ataś ca vyaṅgya-pratītir liṅgi-pratītir eveti
GK16andhvy_u:2114: liṅgi-liṅga-bhāva eva teṣāṃ vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-bhāvo nāparaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvy_u:2115: ataś caitad avaśyam eva boddhavyaṃ yasmād vaktr-abhiprāyāpekṣayā vyañjakatvam idānīm eva tvayā pratipāditaṃ vaktr-abhiprāyaś cānumeya-rūpa eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2116: atrocyate-nanv evam api yadi nāma syāt tat kiṃ naś chinnam /
GK16andhvy_u:2119: tasya caivam api na kācit kṣatiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2120: tad dhi vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvam astu anyad vā /
GK16andhvy_u:2122: prasiddha-śābda-prakāra-vilakṣaṇatvaṃ śabda-vyāpāra-viṣayatvaṃ ca tasyāstīti nāsty evāvayor vivādaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2124: yad-vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvam eva sarvatra vyaṅgya-pratītiś ca liṅgi-pratītir
GK16andhvy_u:2126: yad api sva-pakṣa-siddhaye 'smad-uktam anūditaṃ tvayā vaktr-abhiprāyasya
GK16andhvy_u:2127: vyaṅgyatvenābhyupagamāt tat-prakāśane śabdānāṃ liṅgatvam eveti tad etad yathāsmābhir abhihitaṃ tad vibhajyaṃ pratipādyate śrūyatām-dvividho
GK16andhvy_u:2131: vivakṣā ca śabda-svarūpa-prakāśanecchā śabdenārtha-prakāśanecchā ceti dvi-prakārā /
GK16andhvy_u:2136: te tu dve apy anumeyo viṣayaḥ śabdānām /
GK16andhvy_u:2141: prakāśayituṃ samīhate kadācit sva-śabdānabhidheyatvena prayojanāpekṣayā kayācit /
GK16andhvy_u:2142: sa tu dvividho 'pi pratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitayā svarūpeṇa prakāśate, api tu kṛtrimeṇākṛtrimeṇa vā sambandhāntareṇa /
GK16andhvy_u:2143: vivakṣā-viṣayatvaṃ hi tasyārthasya śabdair liṅgitayā pratīyate na tu svarūpam /
GK16andhvy_u:2144: yadi hi liṅgitayā tatra śabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ syāt tac chabdārthe samyaṅ mithyātvādi vivādā eva na pravarteran
GK16andhvy_u:2146: vyaṅgyaś cārtho vācya-sāmarthyākṣiptatayā vācyavac chabdasya sambandhī bhavaty eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2148: vācya-vācaka-bhāvāśrayatvaṃ ca vyañjakatvasya prāg eva darśitam /
GK16andhvy_u:2150: vaktrabhiprāya-rūpa eva vyaṅgye liṅgatayā śabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2153: 'nabhiprāya-rūpe ca vācakatve naiva vyāpāraḥ sambandhāntareṇa vā /
GK16andhvy_u:2156: na ca vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatva-rūpam eva ālokādiṣv anyathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:2157: tasmāt pratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitvena sambandhī vācyavat /
GK16andhvy_u:2158: yo hi liṅgitvena teṣāṃ sambandhī yathā darśito viṣayaḥ sa na vācyatvena
GK16andhvy_u:2161: tad-viṣayāṇāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ laukikair eva kriyamāṇānām abhāvaḥ prasajyeteti /
GK16andhvy_u:2163: yathā ca vācya-viṣaye pramāṇāntarānugamena samyaktva-pratītau kvacit kriyamāṇāyāṃ tasya pramāṇāntara-viṣayatve saty api na
GK16andhvy_u:2166: vyaṅgya-pratītīnāṃ satyā satya-nirūpaṇasyāprayojakatvam eveti tatra pramāṇāntara-vyāpāra-parīkṣopahāsāyaiva sampadyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2168: eva sarvatra vyaṅgya-pratītir iti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvy_u:2169: yat tv anumeya-rūpa-vyaṅgya-viṣayaṃ śabdānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ tad-dhvani-vyavahārasyāprayojakam
GK16andhvy_u:2170: api tu vyañjakatva-lakṣaṇaḥ śabdānāṃ vyāpāra autpattika-śabdārtha-sambandha-vādināpy abhyupagantavya iti pradarśanārtham upanyastam /
GK16andhvy_u:2171: tad dhi vyañjakatvaṃ kadācil liṅgatvena kadācid rūpāntareṇa śabdānāṃ vācakānām avācakānāṃ ca sarva-vādibhir
GK16andhvy_u:2172: apratikṣepyam ity ayam asmābhir yatna ārabdhaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2173: tad evaṃ guṇa-vṛtti-vācakatvādibhyaḥ śabda-prakārebhyo niyamenaiva tāvad vilakṣaṇaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2179: / evaṃ hi sati sattā-mātra-lakṣaṇe kṛte sakala-sad-vastu-lakṣaṇānāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2182: vimati-viṣayo ya āsīn manīṣiṇāṃ satatam avidita-sa-tattvaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2183: dhvani-saṃjñitaḥ prakāraḥ kāvyasya vyañjitaḥ so 'yam || DhvA_3.33 ||
GK16andhvy_u:2185: yatra vyaṅgyānvaye vācya-cārutvaṃ syāt prakarṣavat // DhvK_3.34 //
GK16andhvy_u:2186: vyaṅgyo 'rtho lalanā-lāvaṇya-prakhyo yaḥ pratipāditas tasya prādhānye dhvanir ity uktam /
GK16andhvy_u:2190: vyaṅgyasya tiraskṛta-vācyebhyaḥ pratīyamānasya kadācid vācya-rūpa-vākyārthāpekṣayā guṇī-bhāve sati guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvy_u:2192: lāvaṇya-sindhur aparaiva hi keyam atra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha samplavante /
GK16andhvy_u:2193: unmajjati dvirada-kumbha-taṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍa-mṛṇāla-daṇḍāḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:2197: tasyaiva svayam uktyā prakāśīkṛtatvena guṇībhāvaḥ, yathodāhṛtam-
GK16andhvy_u:2200: rasavad-alaṅkāre darśitaḥ ; tatra ca teṣām ādhikārika-vākyāpekṣayā
GK16andhvy_u:2205: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yam eva yojyāḥ sumedhasā // DhvK_3.35 //
GK16andhvy_u:2206: ye caite 'parimita-svarūpā api prakāśamānās tathāvidhārtha-ramaṇīyāḥ santo vivekināṃ sukhāvahāḥ kāvya-bandhās teṣu sarveṣv evāyaṃ prakāro
GK16andhvy_u:2209: lacchī duhidā jāmāuo harī taṃsa ghariṇiā gaṅgā /
GK16andhvy_u:2210: amia-miaṅkā a suā aho kuḍumbaṃ mahoahiṇo //
GK16andhvy_u:2211: [lakṣmī duhitā jāmātā hariḥ tathā gṛhiṇī gaṅgā /
GK16andhvy_u:2212: amṛta-mṛgāṅkau ca sutau aho kuṭumbaṃ mahodadheḥ //]// DhvA_3.35//
GK16andhvy_u:2214: prāyeṇaiva parāṃ chāyāṃ bibhral lakṣye nirīkṣyate // DhvK_3.36 //
GK16andhvy_u:2216: yathā-yogam anugame sati cchāyātiśayaṃ bibhral-lakṣaṇa-kārair eka-deśena
GK16andhvy_u:2218: sa tu tathā-rūpaḥ prāyeṇa sarva eva parīkṣyamāṇo lakṣye nirīkṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2220: yataḥ prathamaṃ tāvad atiśayokti-garbhatā sarvālaṅkāreṣu śakya-kriyā /
GK16andhvy_u:2222: mahā-kavibhiḥ kām api kāvyacchaviṃ puṣyati, kathaṃ hy atiśayayogitā
GK16andhvy_u:2223: sva-viṣayaucityena kriyamāṇā satī kāvye notkarṣam āvahet /
GK16andhvy_u:2227: tatrātiśayoktir yam alaṅkāram adhitiṣṭhati kavi-pratibhā-vaśāt tasya
GK16andhvy_u:2233: vyaṅgyatvam api kadācit prādhānyena kadācid guṇa-bhāvena /
GK16andhvy_u:2237: ayaṃ ca prakāro 'nyeṣām apy alaṅkārāṇām asti, teṣāṃ tu na sarva-viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2238: atiśayoktes tu sarvālaṅkāra-viṣayo 'pi sambhavatīty ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2240: rūpakopamā-tulyayogitā-nidarśanādiṣu teṣu gamyamāna-dharma-mukhenaiva yat sādṛśyaṃ tad eva śobhātiśaya-śāli bhavatīti te sarve 'pi
GK16andhvy_u:2242: samāsoktyākṣepa-paryāyokty-ādiṣu tu gamyamānāṃśāvinābhāvenaiva tattva-vyavasthānād guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatā nirvivādaiva /
GK16andhvy_u:2243: tatra ca guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatāyām alaṅkārāṇāṃ keṣāñcid alaṅkāra-viśeṣa-garbhatāyāṃ niyamaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2255: tathā hi “prabhā-mahatyā śikhayeva dīpaḥ” ity ādau sphuṭaiva dīpaka-cchāyā
GK16andhvy_u:2257: tad evaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśa-saṃsparśe sati cārutvātiśaya-yogino rūpakādayo
GK16andhvy_u:2259: guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathā-jātīyānāṃ sarveṣām evoktānuktānāṃ sāmānyam /
GK16andhvy_u:2262: sāmānya-lakṣaṇa-rahitena pratipāda-pāṭheneva śabdā na śakyante tattvato nirjñātum ānantyāt
GK16andhvy_u:2263: anantā hi vāg-vikalpās tat-prakārā eva cālaṅkārāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2268: sarvathā nāsty eva sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-hāriṇaḥ kāvyasya sa prakāro yatra na pratīyamānārtha-saṃsparśena saubhāgyam /
GK16andhvy_u:2269: tad idaṃ kāvya-rahasyaṃ param iti sūribhir bhāvanīyam /
GK16andhvy_u:2272: anayā suprasiddho 'py arthaḥ kim api kāmanīya-kamānīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2276: akṣuṇṇās te cetasā kevalena sthitvaikānte santataṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:2277: ity atra ke 'pīty anena padena vācyam aspaṣṭam abhidadhatā pratīyamānaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2278: vastv-akliṣṭam anantam arpayatā kā chāyā nopapāditā || DhvA_3.37 ||
GK16andhvy_u:2280: sā vyaṅgyasya guṇī-bhāve prakāram imam āśritā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvy_u:2281: yā caiṣā kākvā kvacid arthāntara-pratītirdṛśyate sa vyaṅgyasyārthasya guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūta-vyaṅgya-lakṣaṇaṃ kāvya-prabhedamāśrayate /
GK16andhvy_u:2284: ām asatyaḥ uparama pativrate na tvayā malinitaṃ śīlam /
GK16andhvy_u:2285: kiṃ punar janasya jāyeva nāpitaṃ taṃ na kāmayāmahe //
GK16andhvy_u:2294: prabhedasyāsya viṣayo yaś ca yuktyā pratīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2295: vidhātavyā sahṛdayair na tatra dhvani-yojanā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvy_u:2296: saṅkīrṇo hi kaścid dhvaner guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasya ca lakṣye dṛśyate mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2297: tatra yasya yukti-sahāyatā tatra tena vyapadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2300: patyuḥ śiraś-candra-kalām anena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsa-pūrvam /
GK16andhvy_u:2301: sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīr mālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna //
GK16andhvy_u:2305: na kiṃcid ūce caraṇena kevalaṃ lilekha bāṣpākula-locanā bhuvam //
GK16andhvy_u:2306: ity atra “nirvacanaṃ jaghāna” “na kiṃcid ūce” iti pratiṣedha-mukhena
GK16andhvy_u:2307: vyaṅgyasyārthasyoktyā kiṃcid viṣayī-kṛtatvād guṇībhāva eva śobhate /
GK16andhvy_u:2308: yadā vakroktiṃ vinā vyaṅgyo 'rthas tātparyeṇa pratīyate tadā tasya prādhānyam /
GK16andhvy_u:2315: guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyo 'pi kāvya-prakāro rasa-bhāvādi-tātparyālocane punar dhvanir eva sampadyate
GK16andhvy_u:2318: durārādhā rādhā subhaga yad anenāpi mṛjatas
GK16andhvy_u:2320: kaṭhoraṃ strī-cetas tad alam upacārair virama he kriyāt kalyāṇaṃ vo harir anunayeṣv evam uditaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:2321: evaṃ sthite ca “nyakkāro hy ayam eva” ity ādi-śloka-nirdiṣṭānāṃ padānāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2327: teṣu hi vyaṅgya-viśiṣṭatvaṃ vācyasya pratīyate na tu
GK16andhvy_u:2329: tasmād vākyaṃ tatra dhvaniḥ, padāni tu guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyāni /
GK16andhvy_u:2333: yathātraiva śloke rāvaṇa ity asya prabhedāntara-rūpa-vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:2334: yatra tu vākye rasādi-tātparyaṃ nāsti guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyaiḥ padair udbhāsite 'pi
GK16andhvy_u:2337: rājānam api sevante viṣamam apy upayuñjate /
GK16andhvy_u:2338: ramante ca saha strībhiḥ kuśalāḥ khalu mānavāḥ //ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:2340: yena dhvani-guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyayor alaṅkārāṇāṃ cāsaṅkīrṇo viṣayaḥ sujñāto bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:2341: anyathā tu prasiddhālaṅkāra-viṣaya eva vyāmohaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvy_u:2343: lāvaṇya-draviṇa-vyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahān svīkṛtaḥ svacchandasya sukhaṃ janasya vasataś cintānalo dīpitaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2344: eṣāpi svayam eva tulya-ramaṇābhāvād varākī hatā ko 'rthaś cetasi vedhasā vinihitas tanvyās tanuṃ tanvatā //[*21]
GK16andhvy_u:2346: ity atra vyāja-stutir alaṅkāra iti vyākhyāyi kenacit tan na caturasram,
GK16andhvy_u:2348: yato na tāvad ayaṃ rāgiṇaḥ kasyacid vikalpaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2349: tasya “eṣāpi svayam eva tulya-ramaṇābhāvād varākī hatā” ity evaṃ-vidhokty-anupapatteḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2352: na cāyaṃ ślokaḥ kvacit prabandha iti śrūyate, yena tat-prakaraṇānugatārthatāsya
GK16andhvy_u:2356: nija-mahimotkarṣa-janita-samatsara-jana-jvarasya viśeṣa-jñam ātmano na kañcid evāparaṃ paśyataḥ paridevitam etad iti prakāśyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2357: tathā cāyaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2363: prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva sva-dehe jarām //
GK16andhvy_u:2365: aprastuta-praśaṃsāyāṃ ca yad vācyaṃ tasya kadācid vivakṣitatvaṃ, kadācid
GK16andhvy_u:2366: avivakṣitatvaṃ, kadācid vivakṣitāvivakṣitatvam iti trayī bandha-cchāyā /
GK16andhvy_u:2368: parārthe yaḥ pīḍām anubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro yadīyaḥ sarveṣām iha khalu vikāro 'py abhimataḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2369: na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ yadi sa bhṛśam akṣetra-patitaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2370: kim ikṣor doṣo 'sau na punar aguṇāyā maru-bhuvaḥ //[*22]
GK16andhvy_u:2373: amī ye dṛśyante nanu subhaga-rūpāḥ saphalatā bhavaty eṣāṃ yasya kṣaṇam upagatānāṃ viṣayatām
GK16andhvy_u:2374: nirāloke loke katham idam aho cakṣur adhunā samaṃ jātaṃ sarvair na samam athavānyair avayavaiḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2375: anayor hi dvayoḥ ślokayor ikṣu-cakṣuṣī vivakṣita-svarūpe eva na ca
GK16andhvy_u:2377: mahā-guṇasyāviṣaya-patitatvād aprāpta-para-bhāgasya kasyacit svarūpam upavarṇayituṃ dvayor api ślokayos tātparyeṇa prastutatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:2379: kas tvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daiva-hatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śākhoṭakaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2380: vairāgyād iva vakṣi, sādhu viditaṃ kasmād idaṃ kathyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2381: vāmenātra vaṭas tam adhvaga-janaḥ sarvātmanā sevate na cchāyāpi paropakāra-kariṇī mārga-sthitasyāpi me //
GK16andhvy_u:2382: na hi vṛkṣa-viśeṣeṇa sahokti-pratyuktī sambhavata ity avivakṣitābhidheyenaivānena ślokena
GK16andhvy_u:2383: nirdhanasya kasyacin manasvinaḥ paridevitaṃ tātparyeṇa vākyārthīkṛtam iti pratīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2387: atra hi vācyārtho nātyantaṃ sambhavī na cāsambhavī /
GK16andhvy_u:2391: kāvye ubhe tato 'nyad yat tac citram abhidhīyate // DhvK_3.41 //
GK16andhvy_u:2393: tatra kiṃcic chabda-citraṃ vācya-citram ataḥ param // DhvK_3.42 //
GK16andhvy_u:2397: vyaṅgyārtha-viśeṣa-prakāśana-śakti-śūnyaṃ ca kāvyaṃ kevala-vācya-vācaka-vaicitrya-mātrāśrayeṇopanibaddham ālekhya-prakhyaṃ yad ābhāsate tac citram /
GK16andhvy_u:2402: śabda-citrād anyad vyaṅgyārtha-saṃsparśa-rahitaṃ prādhānyena vākyārthatayā sthitaṃ rasādi-tātparya-rahitam utprekṣādi /
GK16andhvy_u:2403: atha kim idaṃ citraṃ nāma ? yatra na pratīyamānārtha-saṃsparśaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2404: pratīyamāno hy arthas tribhedaḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2405: tatra yatra vastv-alaṅkārāntaraṃ vā vyaṅgyaṃ nāsti sa nāma citrasya kalpyatāṃ viṣayaḥ yatra tu rasādīnām aviṣayatvaṃ sa kāvya-prakāro na sambhavaty eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2407: vastu ca sarvam eva jagad gatam avaśyaṃ kasyacid rasasya bhāvasya vāṅgatvaṃ pratipadyate antato vibhāvatvena /
GK16andhvy_u:2408: citta-vṛtti-viśeṣā hi rasādayaḥ, na ca tad asti vastu kiṃcid yan na citta-vṛtti-viśeṣam upajanayati tad-anutpādane vā
GK16andhvy_u:2409: kavi-viṣayataiva tasya na syāt kavi-viṣayaś ca citratayā kaścin nirūpyate
GK16andhvy_u:2410: atrocyate-satyaṃ na tādṛk-kāvya-prakāro 'sti yatra rasādīnām apratītiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2411: kiṃ tu yadā rasa-bhāvādi-vivakṣā-śūnyaḥ kaviḥ śabdālaṅkāram arthālaṅkāraṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2413: / vivakṣopārūḍha eva hi kāvye śabdānām arthaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2415: kavi-vivakṣā-virahe 'pi tathā-vidhe viṣaye rasādi-pratītir bhavantī paridurbalā bhavatīty anenāpi prakāreṇa nīrasatvaṃ parikalpya citra-viṣayo
GK16andhvy_u:2420: rasādiṣu vivakṣā tu syāt tātparyavatī yadā /
GK16andhvy_u:2421: tadā nāsty eva tat kāvyaṃ dhvaner yatra na gocaraḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:2422: etac ca citraṃ kavīnāṃ viśṛṅkhala-girāṃ rasādi-tātparyam anapekṣyaiva
GK16andhvy_u:2429: rasādi-tātparye ca nāsty eva tad vastu yad
GK16andhvy_u:2431: acetanā pi hi bhāvā yathāyatham ucita-rasa-vibhāvatayā cetana-vṛttānta-yojanayā vā na santy
GK16andhvy_u:2432: eva te ye yānti na rasāṅgatām /
GK16andhvy_u:2436: śṛṅgārī cet kaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasa-mayaṃ jagat /
GK16andhvy_u:2437: sa eva vīta-rāgaś cen nīrasaṃ sarvam eva tat //
GK16andhvy_u:2440: tasmān nāsty eva tad vastu yat sarvātmanā rasa-tātparyavataḥ kaves
GK16andhvy_u:2443: sarvam etac ca mahā-kavīnāṃ kāvyeṣu dṛśyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2444: asmābhir api sveṣu kāvya-prabandheṣu yathāyathaṃ darśitam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2445: sthite caivaṃ sarva eva kāvya-prakāro na dhvani-dharmatām atipatati
GK16andhvy_u:2448: yadā tu cāṭuṣu devatā-stutiṣu vā rasādīnām aṅgatayā vyavasthānaṃ hṛdayavatīṣu ca suprajñaka-gāthāsu
GK16andhvy_u:2451: tad evam idānīṃtana-kavi-kāvya-nayopadeśe kriyamāṇe prāthamikānām abhyāsārthināṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2452: yadi paraṃ citreṇa vyavahāraḥ, prāpta-pariṇatīnāṃ tu dhvanir eva kāvyam iti sthitam etat /
GK16andhvy_u:2454: yasmin raso vā bhāvo vā tātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvy_u:2457: sarvatra tatra viṣayī jñeyaḥ sahṛdayair janaiḥ || DhvA_3.42 ||
GK16andhvy_u:2459: saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭibhyāṃ punar apy uddyotate bahudhā // DhvK_3.43 //
GK16andhvy_u:2460: tasya ca dhvaneḥ sva-prabhedair guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyena vācyālaṅkāraiś ca saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭi-vyavasthāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ bahu-prabhedatā lakṣye dṛśyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2472: khaṇa-pāhuṇiā deara esā jāāeṃ kiṃ pi de bhaṇidā /
GK16andhvy_u:2474: [kṣaṇa-prāghuṇikā devara eṣā jāyayā kim api te bhaṇitā /
GK16andhvy_u:2476: atra hy anunīyatām ity etat-padam arthāntara-saṅkramita-vācyatvena
GK16andhvy_u:2480: eka-vyañjakānupraveśena tu vyaṅgyatvam alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya sva-prabhedāntarāpekṣayā bāhulyena sambhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:2484: guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgya-saṅkīrṇatvaṃ yathā-”nyak-kāro hy ayam eva me yad arayaḥ” ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:2488: rājā duḥśāsanāder gurur anuja-śatasyāṅga-rājasya mitraṃ kvāste duryodhano 'sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭum abhyāgatau svaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:2491: ata eva ca padārthāśrayatve guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyasya vākyārthāśrayatve ca dhvaneḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2493: yathā hi dhvani-prabhedāntarāṇi parasparaṃ saṅkīryante padārtha-vākyārthāśrayatvena
GK16andhvy_u:2495: kiṃ caika-vyaṅgyāśrayatve tu pradhāna-guṇa-bhāvo virudhyate na tu
GK16andhvy_u:2497: ayaṃ ca saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭi-vyavahāro bahūnām ekatra vācya-vācaka-bhāva iva
GK16andhvy_u:2499: yatra tu padāni kānicid avivakṣita-vācyāny anuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-vācyāni vā tatra dhvani-guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:2503: dhvani-prabheda-rūpe “te” “jāne” ity ete ca pade guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgya-rūpe /
GK16andhvy_u:2504: vācyālaṅkāra-saṅkīrṇatvam alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyāpekṣayā rasavati sālaṅkāre kāvye sarvatra suvyavasthitam /
GK16andhvy_u:2505: prabhedāntarāṇām api kadācit saṅkīrṇatvaṃ bhavaty eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2507: yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayituṃ kācit kavīnāṃ navā dṛṣṭir yā pariniṣṭhitārtha-viṣayonmeṣā ca vaipaścitī /
GK16andhvy_u:2508: te dve apy avalambya viśvam aniśaṃ nirvarṇayanto vayaṃ śrāntā naiva ca labdham abdhi-śayana ! tvad-bhakti-tulyaṃ sukham //
GK16andhvy_u:2515: dīrghīkurvan paṭu mada-kalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭita-kamalāmoda-maitrī-kaṣāyaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2516: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surata-glānim aṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanā-cāṭu-kāraḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2533: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabheda-bhedāś ca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvy_u:2534: saṅkhyātuṃ diṅ-mātraṃ teṣām idam uktam asmābhiḥ // DhvK_3.44 //
GK16andhvy_u:2535: anantā hi dhvaneḥ prakārāḥ sahṛdayānāṃ vyutpattaye teṣāṃ diṅ-mātraṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2537: ity ukta-lakṣaṇo yo dhvanir vivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ sat-kāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ vā samyag abhiyuktaiḥ // DhvK_3.45 //
GK16andhvy_u:2538: ukta-svarūpa-dhvani-nirūpaṇa-nipuṇā hi sat-kavayaḥ sahṛdayāś ca niyatam
GK16andhvy_u:2542: etad-dhvani-pravartanena nirṇītaṃ kāvya-tattvam asphuṭa-sphuritaṃ sad aśaknuvadbhiḥ pratipādayituṃ vaidarbhī gauḍī pāñcālī ceti rītayaḥ pravartitāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2543: rīti-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyināṃ hi kāvya-tattvam etad asphuṭatayā manāk-sphuritam āsīd iti lakṣyate tad atra sphuṭatayā sampradarśitenānyena
GK16andhvy_u:2547: asmin vyaṅgya-vyañjakabhāvavivecanamaye kāvya-lakṣaṇe jñāte sati yāḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2548: kāścitprasiddhā upanāgarikādyāḥ śabdatattvāśrayāḥ vṛttayo yāścārthatattvasambaddhāḥ kaiśikyādayastāḥ samyagrītipadavīmavataranti /
GK16andhvy_u:2549: anyathā tu tāsāmadṛṣṭārthānām iva vṛttīnāmaśraddheyatvam eva syānnānubhavasiddhatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:2551: yatra śabdānām arthānāṃ ca keṣāñcitpratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ jātyatvam iva ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvamanākhyeyamavabhāsate kāvye tatra dhvanivyavahāra iti yallakṣaṇaṃ dhvaner ucyate kenacittadayuktam iti nābhidheyatāmarhati /
GK16andhvy_u:2552: yataḥ śabdānāṃ svarūpāśrayas tāvad akliṣṭatve satyaprayuktaprayogaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2553: vācakāśrayas tu prasādo vyañjakatvaṃ ceti viśeṣaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2554: / arthānāṃ ca sphuṭatvenāvabhāsanaṃ vyaṅgyaparatvaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśaviśiṣṭatvam ceti viśeṣaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2555: tau ca viśeṣau vyākhyātuṃ śakyete vyākhyātau ca bahuprakāram /
GK16andhvy_u:2559: sāmānyasaṃsparśivikalpaśabdāgocaratve sati, prakāśamānatvaṃ tu yadanākhyeyatvam ucyate kvacit tad api kāvyaviśeṣāṇāṃ ratnaviśeṣāṇām iva na sambhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:2564: ratnatattvavidaḥ, sahṛdayā eva hi kāvyānāṃ rasajñā iti kasyātra vipratipattiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2565: yat tv anirdeśyatvaṃ sarva-lakṣaṇa-viṣayaṃ bauddhānāṃ prasiddhaṃ tattanmataparīkṣāyāṃ granthāntare nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2566: iha tu granthāntaraśravaṇalavaprakāśanaṃ sahṛdayavaimanasyapradāyīti na prakriyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2567: bauddhamatena vā yathā pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ tathāsmākaṃ dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvy_u:2571: na lakṣaṇaṃ, lakṣaṇaṃ tu sādhīyo 'sya yathoditam //
GK16andhvy_u:2578: ya eṣa dhvaner guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyasya ca mārgaḥ prakāśitas tasya phalāntaraṃ kavi-pratibhānantyam
GK16andhvy_u:2581: vāṇī navatvam āyāti pūrvārthānvayavaty api // DhvK_4.2 //
GK16andhvy_u:2582: ato dhvaner ukta-prabheda-madhyād anyatamenāpi prakāreṇa vibhūṣitā satī vāṇī purātana-kavi-nibaddhārtha-saṃsparśavaty api navatvam āyāti /
GK16andhvy_u:2583: tathā hy avivakṣita-vācyasya dhvaneḥ prakāra-dvaya-samāśrayeṇa navatvaṃ pūrvārthānugame 'pi,
GK16andhvy_u:2587: spṛśantyās tāruṇyaṃ kim iva hi na ramyaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:2591: ity evam ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsv api
GK16andhvy_u:2594: yaḥ prathamaḥ prathamaḥ sa tu tathā hi hata-hasti-bahala-palalāśī /
GK16andhvy_u:2597: mahadbhir api mātaṅgaiḥ siṃhaḥ kim abhibhūyate //
GK16andhvy_u:2598: ity evam ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsv apy
GK16andhvy_u:2601: nidrā-kaitavinaḥ priyasya vadane vinyasya vaktraṃ vadhūr bodha-trāsa-niruddha-cumbana-rasāpy ābhoga-lolaṃ sthitā /
GK16andhvy_u:2602: vailakṣyād vimukhībhaved iti punas tasyāpy anārambhiṇaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2603: sākāṅkṣa-pratipatti nāma hṛdayaṃ yātaṃ tu pāraṃ rateḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:2605: śūnyaṃ vāsa-gṛhaṃ vilokya śayanād utthāya kiṃcic chanair nidrā-vyājam upāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyur mukham /
GK16andhvy_u:2607: lajjā-namra-mukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //
GK16andhvy_u:2608: ity ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsv api navatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:2609: yathā vā-”taraṅgabhrūbhaṅgā” ity ādiślokasya “nānābhaṅgibhramadbhrūḥ” ity ādiślokāpekṣayānyatvam yuktyānayānusartavyo rasādir bahu-vistaraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2610: mitho 'py anantatāṃ prāptaḥ kāvya-mārgo yadāśrayāt // DhvK_4.3 //
GK16andhvy_u:2611: bahu-vistāro 'yaṃ rasa-bhāva-tad-ābhāsa-tat-praśama-lakṣaṇo mārgo yathāsvaṃ vibhāvānubhāva-prabheda-kalanayā yathoktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvy_u:2614: purātanaiḥ kavibhiḥ sahasra-saṃkhyair asaṃkhyair vā bahu-prakāraṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2618: caikaika-prabhedāpekṣayāpi tāvaj jagad-vṛttam upanibadhyamānaṃ sukavibhis tad-icchā-vaśād anyathā sthitam apy anyathaiva vivartate /
GK16andhvy_u:2621: atathā-sthitān api tathā-saṃsthitān iva hṛdaye yā niveśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:2623: tad itthaṃ rasa-bhāvādy-āśrayeṇa kāvyārthānām ānantyaṃ supratipāditam /
GK16andhvy_u:2625: dṛṣṭa-pūrvā api hy arthāḥ kāvye rasa-parigrahāt /
GK16andhvy_u:2626: sarve navā ivābhānti madhu-māsa iva drumāḥ // DhvK_4.4 //
GK16andhvy_u:2630: śeṣo hima-giris tvaṃ ca mahānto guravaḥ sthirāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2643: ity ādiṣu satsv apy apūrvatvam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2649: haa soṇhāeṃ taha kaho jaha kaṇḍa-karaṇḍaaṃ baha{i} //
GK16andhvy_u:2651: hata-snuṣayā tathā kṛto yathā kāṇḍa-karaṇḍakaṃ vahati //]
GK16andhvy_u:2652: evam ādiṣv artheṣu satsv apy anālīḍhataiva || DhvA_4.4 ||
GK16andhvy_u:2653: yathā vyaṅgya-bheda-samāśrayeṇa dhvaneḥ kāvyārthānāṃ navatvam utpadyate,
GK16andhvy_u:2657: atra ca punaḥ punar uktam api sāratayedam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:2659: rasādi-maya ekasmin kaviḥ syād avadhānavān // DhvK_4.5 //
GK16andhvy_u:2660: asminn arthānantya-hetau vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-bhāve vicitre śabdānāṃ sambhavaty api kavir apūrvārtha-lābhārthī rasādi-maya ekasmin
GK16andhvy_u:2662: rasa-bhāva-tad-ābhāsa-rūpe hi vyaṅgye tad-vyañjakeṣu ca yathā-nirdiṣṭeṣu
GK16andhvy_u:2665: tathā ca rāmāyaṇa-mahābhāratādiṣu saṅgrāmādayaḥ punaḥ punar abhihitā api nava-navāḥ prakāśante
GK16andhvy_u:2666: prabandhe cāṅgī rasa eka evopanibadhyamāno 'rtha-viśeṣa-lābhaṃ chāyātiśayaṃ ca puṣṇāti
GK16andhvy_u:2669: rāmāyaṇe hi karuṇo rasaḥ svayam ādi-kavinā
GK16andhvy_u:2675: vṛṣṇi-pāṇḍava-virasāvasāna-vaimanasya-dāyinīṃ samāptim upanibadhnatā mahā-muninā vairāgya-janana-tātparyaṃ prādhānyena sva-prabandhasya
GK16andhvy_u:2676: darśayatā mokṣa-lakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārthaḥ śānto rasaś ca mukhyatayā vivakṣā-viṣayatvena sūcitaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2683: tathā tathā virāgo 'tra jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:2685: tataś ca śānto raso rasāntarair mokṣa-lakṣaṇaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2688: aṅgāṅgi-bhāvaś ca yathā rasānāṃ tathā pratipāditam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2689: pāramārthikāntas tattvānapekṣayā śarīrasyevāṅga-bhūtasya rasasya puruṣārthasya ca sva-prādhānyena cārutvam apy aviruddham /
GK16andhvy_u:2690: nanu mahābhārate yāvān vivakṣā-viṣayaḥ so 'nukramaṇyāṃ sarva evānukrānto na caitat tatra dṛśyate, pratyuta sarva-puruṣārtha-prabodha-hetutvaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2693: atrocyate-satyaṃ śāntasyaiva rasasyāṅgitvaṃ mahābhārate mokṣasya ca sarva-puruṣārthebhyaḥ prādhānyam ity etan na
GK16andhvy_u:2694: sva-śabdābhidheya-tvenānukramaṇyā darśitam, darśitaṃ tu vyaṅgyatvena-”bhagavān vāsudevaś ca kīrtyate 'tra sanātanaḥ” ity asmin vākye /
GK16andhvy_u:2695: anena hy ayam artho vyaṅgyatvena vivakṣito yad atra mahābhārate
GK16andhvy_u:2696: pāṇḍavādi-caritaṃ yat kīrtyate tat sarvam avasāna-virasam
GK16andhvy_u:2697: avidyā-prapañca-rūpaṃ ca, paramārtha-satya-svarūpas tu bhagavān vāsudevo
GK16andhvy_u:2699: tasmāt tasminn eva parameśvare bhagavati bhavata
GK16andhvy_u:2700: bhāvita-cetaso, mā bhūta vibhūtiṣu niḥsārāsu rāgiṇo guṇeṣu vā
GK16andhvy_u:2704: evārthaṃ dyotayan sphuṭam evāvabhāsate vyañjaka-śakty-anugṛhītaś ca śabdaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2711: bhakty-atiśayaṃ pravartayatā sakala eva sāṃsāriko vyavahāraḥ pūrva-pakṣīkṛto nyakṣeṇa prakāśate
GK16andhvy_u:2715: pāṇḍavādi-carita-varṇanasyāpi vairāgya-janana-tātparyād vairāgyasya ca mokṣa-mūlatvān mokṣasya ca bhagavat-prāpty-upāyatvena mukhyatayā gītādiṣu pradarśitatvāt para-brahma-prāpty-upāyatvam eva paramparayā /
GK16andhvy_u:2716: vāsudevādi-saṃjñābhidheyatvena cāparimita-śakty-āspadaṃ paraṃ brahma gītādi-pradeśāntareṣu tad-abhidhānatvena labdha-prasiddhi
GK16andhvy_u:2722: sarvasyānyasyānityatāṃ prakāśayatā mokṣa-lakṣaṇa evaikaḥ paraḥ puruṣārthaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2723: śāstranaye, kāvya-naye ca tṛṣṇākṣaya-sukha-paripoṣa-lakṣaṇaḥ śānto raso mahābhāratasyāṅgitvena vivakṣita iti supratipāditam /
GK16andhvy_u:2724: atyanta-sāra-bhūtatvāc cāyam artho vyaṅgyatvenaiva darśito na tu
GK16andhvy_u:2726: sāra-bhūto hy arthaḥ sva-śabdānabhidheyatvena prakāśitaḥ sutarām eva śobhām āvahati /
GK16andhvy_u:2728: vidagdha-vidvat-pariṣatsu yad abhimatataraṃ vastu vyaṅgyatvena prakāśyate na sākṣāc-chabda-vācyatvena
GK16andhvy_u:2729: tasmāt sthitam etat-aṅgibhūta-rasādy-āśrayeṇa kāvye kriyamāṇe navārtha-lābho bhavati
GK16andhvy_u:2736: yenaika-culake dṛṣṭau tau divyau matsya-kacchapau //ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:2741: kṣuṇṇaṃ hi vastu loka-prasiddhyādbhutam api nāścaryakāri bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:2742: na cākṣuṇṇaṃ vastūpanibadhyamānam adbhuta-rasasyaivānuguṇaṃ yāvad rasāntarasyāpi /
GK16andhvy_u:2748: etad gāthārthād bhāvyamānād yā rasa-pratītir bhavati, sā tvāṃ spṛṣṭvā
GK16andhvy_u:2749: svidyati romāñcate vepate ity evaṃ-vidhād arthāt pratīyamānān manāg api no jāyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2750: tad evaṃ dhvani-prabheda-samāśrayeṇa yathā kāvyārthānāṃ navatvaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2753: ye prakārās tat-samāśrayeṇāpi kāvya-vastūnāṃ navatvaṃ bhavaty eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2754: tat tv ativistāra-kārīti nodāhṛtaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ svayam utprekṣaṇīyam || DhvA_4.5 ||
GK16andhvy_u:2756: na kāvyārtha-virāmo 'sti yadi syāt pratibhā-guṇaḥ // DhvK_4.6 //
GK16andhvy_u:2757: satsv api purātana-kavi-prabandheṣu yadi syāt pratibhā-guṇaḥ, tasmiṃs tv asati na kiṃcid eva kaver vastv asti /
GK16andhvy_u:2766: na cārthānantyaṃ vyaṅgyārthāpekṣayaiva yāvad vācyārthāpekṣayāpīti pratipādayitum ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:2768: ānantyam eva vācyasya śuddhasyāpi svabhāvataḥ // DhvK_4.7 //
GK16andhvy_u:2770: svabhāvo hy ayaṃ vācyānāṃ cetanānām acetanānāṃ ca yad avasthā-bhedād
GK16andhvy_u:2773: svabhāvoktyāpi tāvad upanibadhyamānair niravadhiḥ kāvyārthaḥ sampadyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2774: tathā hy avasthā-bhedān navatvaṃ yathā-bhagavatī pārvatī kumārasambhave “sarvopamā-dravya-samuccayena” [ku.saṃ. 1.49] ity ādibhir uktibhiḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2775: prathamam eva parisamāpita-rūpa-varṇanāpi punar bhagavataḥ śambhor
GK16andhvy_u:2779: navodvāha-samaye prasādhyamānā “tāṃ prāṅ-mukhīṃ tatra niveśya tanvīm” ity
GK16andhvy_u:2781: na ca te tasya kaver ekatraivāsakṛt-kṛtā varṇana-prakārā apunar-uktatvena
GK16andhvy_u:2785: ṇa a tāṇaṃ ghaḍa(i) ohī ṇa a te dīsanti kaha bi punaruttā /
GK16andhvy_u:2786: je bibbhamā piāṇaṃ atthā vā suka(i)-bāṇīnaṃ //
GK16andhvy_u:2787: [na ca teṣāṃ ghaṭate 'vadhiḥ, na ca te dṛśyante katham api punaruktāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2788: ye vibhramāḥ priyāṇām arthā vā sukavi-vāṇīnām //]
GK16andhvy_u:2789: ayam aparaś cāvasthā-bheda-prakāro yad acetanānāṃ sarveṣāṃ cetanaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam abhimānitva-prasiddhaṃ himavad gaṅgādīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:2792: / yathā kumāra-sambhava eva parvata-svarūpasya himavato varṇanaṃ, punaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2793: saptarṣi-priyoktiṣu cetana-tat-svarūpāpekṣayā pradarśitaṃ tad apūrvam eva pratibhāti /
GK16andhvy_u:2797: cetanānāṃ ca bālyādy-avasthābhir anyatvaṃ sat-kavīnāṃ prasiddham eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2802: / acetanānāṃ ca bhāvānām ārambhādy-avasthā-bheda-bhinnānām ekaikaśaḥ svarūpam upanibadhyamānam ānantyam evopayāti /
GK16andhvy_u:2804: haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitair āsajyate kūjatām anyaḥ ko 'pi kaṣāya-kaṇṭha-luṭhanād āghargharo vibhramaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2810: / yathā vāyūnāṃ nānā-dig-deśa-cāriṇām anyeṣām api salila-kusumādīnāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2813: grāmāraṇya-salilādi-samedhitānāṃ parasparaṃ mahān viśeṣaḥ samupalakṣyata eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2814: sa ca vivicya yathāyatham upanibadhyamānas tathaivānantyam āyāti /
GK16andhvy_u:2815: tathā hi-mānuṣāṇām eva tāvad dig-deśādi-bhinnānāṃ ye vyavahāra-vyāpārādiṣu
GK16andhvy_u:2816: vicitrā viśeṣās teṣāṃ kenāntaḥ śakyate gantum, viśeṣato yoṣitām /
GK16andhvy_u:2817: upanibadhyate ca tat sarvam eva sukavibhir yathā-pratibham /
GK16andhvy_u:2822: svālakṣaṇya-prabhedāc ca sakala-jagad-gatānāṃ vastūnāṃ vinibandhanaṃ prasiddham eva /
GK16andhvy_u:2823: tac ca yathāvasthitam api tāvad upanibadhyamānam anantatām eva kāvyārthasyāpādayati /
GK16andhvy_u:2824: atra kecid ācakṣīran-yathā sāmānyātmanā vastūni vācyatāṃ pratipadyante na viśeṣātmanā ; tāni hi svayam anubhūtānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ tan-nimittānāṃ ca svarūpam anyatrāropayadbhiḥ
GK16andhvy_u:2826: na hi tair atītam anāgataṃ vartamānaṃ ca paricitādi-sva-lakṣaṇaṃ yogibhir iva pratyakṣīkriyate ; tac cānubhāvyānubhava-sāmānyaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2829: ata eva sa prakāra-viśeṣo yair adyatanair abhinavatvena pratīyate teṣām abhimāna-mātram eva bhaṇiti-kṛtaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:2831: tatrocyate-yat tūktaṃ sāmānya-mātrāśrayeṇa kāvya-pravṛttis tasya ca parimitatvena prāg eva gocarī-kṛtatvān nāsti navatvaṃ kāvya-vastūnām iti,
GK16andhvy_u:2832: tad ayuktam ; yato yadi sāmānya-mātram āśritya kāvyaṃ pravartate kiṃ kṛtas tarhi mahā-kavi-nibadhyamānānāṃ kāvyārthānām atiśayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2833: vālmīki-vyatiriktasyānyasya kavi-vyapadeśa eva vā sāmānya-vyatiriktasyānyasya kāvyārthasyābhāvāt, sāmānyasya cādikavinaiva pradarśitatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:2834: ukti-vaicitryān naiṣa doṣa iti cet-kim idam
GK16andhvy_u:2837: kathaṃ na vācya-vaicitryam ? vācya-vācakayor avinābhāvena pravṛtteḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2838: vācyānāṃ ca kāvye pratibhāsamānānāṃ yad rūpaṃ tat tu grāhya-viśeṣābhedenaiva pratīyate
GK16andhvy_u:2844: iṣyate pratibhārtheṣu tat tad ānantyam akṣayam //
GK16andhvy_u:2845: kiṃ ca, ukti-vaicitryaṃ yat kāvya-navatve nibandhanam ucyate tad
GK16andhvy_u:2848: prakāraḥ prāg darśitaḥ sa sarva eva punarukti-vaicitryād dvi-guṇatām
GK16andhvy_u:2850: yaś cāyam upamā-śleṣādir alaṅkāra-vargaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa bhaṇiti-vaicitryād upanibadhyamānaḥ svayam evānavadhir dhatte punaḥ śata-śākhatām /
GK16andhvy_u:2851: bhaṇitiś ca sva-bhāṣā-bhedena vyavasthitā satī pratiniyata-bhāṣā-gocarārtha-vaicitrya-nibandhanaṃ punar aparaṃ kāvyārthānām ānantyam āpādayati /
GK16andhvy_u:2853: maha maha iti bhaṇantaho bajjadi kālo jaṇassa /
GK16andhvy_u:2854: toi ṇa deu janaddaṇu goarībhodi maṇassa //
GK16andhvy_u:2855: [mama mama iti bhaṇato vrajati kālo janasya /
GK16andhvy_u:2856: tathāpi na devo janārdano gocaro bhavati manasaḥ] || DhvA_4.7 ||
GK16andhvy_u:2857: itthaṃ yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathā na labhyate 'ntaḥ kāvyārthānām /
GK16andhvy_u:2864: tad idam atra saṅkṣepeṇābhidhīyate sat-kavīnām upadeśāya-
GK16andhvy_u:2869: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva // DhvK_4.10 //
GK16andhvy_u:2873: tadvad eveyaṃ kāvya-sthitir anantābhiḥ kavi-matibhir upabhuktāpi nedānīṃ parihīyate, pratyuta nava-navābhir vyutpattibhiḥ parivardhate /
GK16andhvy_u:2875: saṃvādās tu bhavanty eva bāhulyena sumedhasām /
GK16andhvy_u:2876: sthitaṃ hy etat saṃvādinya eva medhāvināṃ buddhayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2878: naika-rūpatayā sarve te mantavyā vipaścitā // DhvK_4.11 //
GK16andhvy_u:2880: saṃvādo hy anya-sādṛśyaṃ tat punaḥ pratibimbavat /
GK16andhvy_u:2882: saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyate yad anyena kāvya-vastunā sādṛśyam /
GK16andhvy_u:2883: tat punaḥ śarīriṇāṃ pratibimbavad ālekhyākāravat tulya-dehivac ca tridhā vyavasthitam /
GK16andhvy_u:2885: pratibimba-kalpam, anyad ālekhya-prakhyam, anyat tulyena śarīriṇā sadṛśam
GK16andhvy_u:2887: tṛtīyaṃ tu prasiddhātma nānya-sāmyaṃ tyajet kaviḥ // DhvK_4.13 //
GK16andhvy_u:2888: tatra pūrvaṃ pratibimba-kalpaṃ kāvya-vastu parihartavyaṃ sumatinā /
GK16andhvy_u:2893: tṛtīyaṃ tu vibhinna-kamanīya-śarīra-sadbhāve sati sasaṃvādam api kāvya-vastu na tyaktavyaṃ kavinā /
GK16andhvy_u:2894: na hi śarīrī śarīriṇānyena sadṛśo 'py eka eveti śakyate vaktum || DhvA_4.13 ||
GK16andhvy_u:2897: vastu bhātitarāṃ tanvyāḥ śaśi-cchāyam ivānanam // DhvK_4.14 //
GK16andhvy_u:2898: tattvasya sāra-bhūtasyātmanaḥ sad-bhāve 'nyasya pūrva-sthity-anuyāyy api vastu bhātitarām
GK16andhvy_u:2899: purāṇa-ramaṇīya-cchāyānugṛhītaṃ hi vastu śarīravat parāṃ śobhāṃ puṣyati /
GK16andhvy_u:2902: evaṃ tāvat sa-saṃvādānāṃ samudāya-rūpāṇāṃ vākyārthānāṃ vibhaktāḥ sīmānaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:2903: padārtha-rūpāṇāṃ ca vastv-antara-sadṛśānāṃ kāvya-vastūnāṃ nāsty eva doṣa
GK16andhvy_u:2906: nūtane sphurati kāvya-vastuni vyaktam eva khalu sā na duṣyati // DhvK_4.15
GK16andhvy_u:2907: na hi vācaspatināpy akṣarāṇi padāni vā kānicid apūrvāṇi ghaṭayituṃ śakyante /
GK16andhvy_u:2908: tāni tu tāny evopanibaddhāni na kāvyādiṣu navatāṃ virudhyanti /
GK16andhvy_u:2916: sphuraṇeyaṃ kācid iti sahṛdayānāṃ camatkṛtir utpadyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2917: anugatam api pūrva-cchāyayā vastu tādṛk sukavir upanibadhnan nindyatāṃ nopayāti // DhvK_4.16
GK16andhvy_u:2918: tad-anugatam api pūrva-cchāyayā vastu tādṛk tādṛkṣaṃ sukavir
GK16andhvy_u:2923: na sādaḥ kartavyaḥ kavibhir anavadye sva-viṣaye /
GK16andhvy_u:2924: santi navāḥ kāvyārthāḥ paropanibaddhārtha-viracane na kaścit kaver guṇa iti bhāvayitvā /
GK16andhvy_u:2925: parasvādānecchā-virata-manaso vastu sukaveḥ sarasvaty evaiṣā ghaṭayati yatheṣṭaṃ bhagavatī para-svādānecchāvirata-manasaḥ sukaveḥ sarasvaty eṣā bhagavatī yatheṣṭaṃ ghaṭayati vastu
GK16andhvy_u:2927: pravṛttis teṣāṃ paroparacitārtha-parigraha-niḥspṛhāṇāṃ sva-vyāpāro na kvacid upayujyate /
GK16andhvy_u:2928: saiva bhagavatī sarasvatī svayam abhimatam artham āvirbhāvayati /
GK16andhvy_u:2929: etad eva hi mahākavitvaṃ mahākavīnām ity om /
GK16andhvy_u:2931: yasmād vastu samīhitaṃ sukṛtibhiḥ sarvaṃ samāsādyate /
